# Initials

`Initials` renders a given name with initials.

## Usage

```jsx live
import { Initials } from "@wp-g2/components"

function Example() {
  return <Initials name="Elsa Oldenburg" />
}
```

| Name                   | Type                             | Default  | Description                                                                                                    |
| ---------------------- | -------------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| align                  | `CSS['textAlign']`               |          | Adjusts the text alignment.                                                                                    |
| color                  | `CSS['color']`                   |          | Adjusts the text color.                                                                                        |
| display                | `CSS['display']`                 |          | Adjusts the CSS display.                                                                                       |
| ellipsis               | `string`                         | `'...'`  | The ellipsis string when `truncate` is set.                                                                    |
| ellipsizeMode          | `TruncateEllisizeMode`           | `'auto'` | Determines where to truncate. `truncate` must first be set.                                                    |
| highlightCaseSensitive | `boolean`                        |          | Escape characters in `highlightWords` which are meaningful in regular expressions.                             |
| highlightEscape        | `boolean`                        |          | Determines if `highlightWords` should be case sensitive.                                                       |
| highlightSanitize      | `boolean`                        |          | Array of search words. String search terms are automatically cast to RegExps unless `highlightEscape` is true. |
| highlightWords         | `Array<string`,`any>`            |          | Highlights words within the text content.                                                                      |
| isBlock                | `boolean`                        |          | Sets `Text` to have `display: block`.                                                                          |
| isDestructive          | `boolean`                        | `false`  | Renders a destructive color.                                                                                   |
| limit                  | `number`                         | `0`      | Determines the max characters when `truncate` is set.                                                          |
| lineHeight             | `CSS['lineHeight']`              |          | Adjusts all text line-height based on the typography system.                                                   |
| name                   | `string`                         |          | The name to render as initials.                                                                                |
| numberOfLines          | `number`                         |          | Determines how many lines to truncate. `truncate` must first be set.                                           |
| optimizeReadabilityFor | `CSS['color']`                   |          | Optimizes text (black or white) readability for given background color.                                        |
| size                   | `CSS['fontSize']`,`TextSize`     |          | Adjusts text size based on the typography system.                                                              |
| truncate               | `boolean`                        |          | Enables text truncation.                                                                                       |
| upperCase              | `boolean`                        |          | Uppercases the text content.                                                                                   |
| variant                | `TextVariant`                    |          | Adjusts style variation of the text.                                                                           |
| weight                 | `CSS['fontWeight']`,`TextWeight` |          | Adjusts font-weight of the text.                                                                               |

`Initials` uses `Text` underneath, so we have access to all of `Text`'s props. For a complete list of props, check out [`Text`](/components/text/#props).
